title: Bug 18268: Images and files not found in NL-specific subdirectories
description:
Bug 18268: Images and files are not being found in NL-specific subdirectories. Build 200205291235.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Start eclipse.

Observed Behavior:
- Delete <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif.
- Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini.
- Change the value of the aboutImage property: aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif.
- Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini.
- Change the value of the aboutImage property: aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif.
- Open the about dialog.
- There is a main image again.

Expected Behavior:
- Open the about dialog.
- There is no main image.

This suggests that the UI is correctly passing the entire path to IPluginDescriptor.find, but that the $nl$ path segment is not being handled correctly.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Exit eclipse.
2. Copy the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif down into an NL-specific subdirectory; i.e., move it to <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/nl/en/eclipselg.gif.
3. Start eclipse.
OB: There is a main image again.
SR: Exit eclipse. Copy the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif down into an NL-specific subdirectory; i.e., move it to <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/nl/en/eclipselg.gif. Start eclipse.
